snippet: Mike D’Antoni enjoyed a brief reunion with his wife and his son before his Lakers faced the Knicks at Madison Square Garden, where the reception was more hostile.
abstract: Los Angeles Lakers coach Mike D'Antoni, former coach of the New York Knicks, is booed by fans at Madison Square Garden as Knicks top Lakers, 116-107.
lead_paragraph: Mike D’Antoni enjoyed a brief reunion with his wife and his son before his Lakers faced the Knicks at Madison Square Garden, where the reception was more hostile.

headline.seo: D’Antoni, Now Lakers Coach, Returns to Face Knicks
headline.main: Fans Jeer D’Antoni, but Sting Is in Defeat
headline.print_headline: Fans Jeer D’Antoni, But Sting Is in Defeat
